      Add the x,y,z,w components of the passed in quaternion to the ones of this quaternion

      Conjugate the quaternion.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.cpy()  
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.exp​(float alpha)
      Calculates (this quaternion)^alpha where alpha is a real number and stores the result in this quaternion.

      Sets the quaternion to an identity Quaternionf

      Multiplies the components of this quaternion with the given scalar.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.mul​(Quaternionf other)
      Multiplies this quaternion with another one in the form of this = this * other
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.mulLeft​(Quaternionf other)
      Multiplies this quaternion with another one in the form of this = other * this
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.nor()
      Normalizes this quaternion to unit length

      Sets the components of the quaternion

      Sets the quaternion components from the given quaternion.

      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.

      Sets the quaternion to the given euler angles in degrees.

      Sets the quaternion to the given euler angles in radians.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given x-, y- and z-axis.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given x-, y- and z-axis which have to be orthonormal.

      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.

      Set this quaternion to the rotation between two vectors.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given rotation matrix, which must not contain scaling.

      Sets the Quaternionf from the given rotation matrix, which must not contain scaling.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.slerp​(Quaternionf[] q)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions and stores the result in this Quaternionf.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.slerp​(Quaternionf[] q, float[] w)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions by the given weights and stores the result in this Quaternionf.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.slerp​(Quaternionf end, float alpha)
      Spherical linear interpolation between this quaternion and the other quaternion, based on the alpha value in the range [0,1].
